summary: This bill, the Disaster Mitigation and Tax Parity Act of 2025, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income amounts received from state-based catastrophe loss mitigation programs. These programs provide payments for property improvements designed to reduce damage from windstorms, earthquakes, or wildfires. The amendments apply retroactively to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2020, allowing individuals to claim the exclusion.
